FSW.content: why Derrida hesitates to utilize Freud’s psychoanalytic concepts: belong to history of metaphysics, logocentric repression which excludes written trace, calls it servile, excrement
FSW.linkedContent: why Derrida hesitates to utilize Freud’s psychoanalytic concepts: belong to history of metaphysics, logocentric repression which excludes written trace, calls it servile, excrement

FSW.content: eating words, as excrement, as nourishing honey, as inky dust of law [Ezekiel, Numbers]
FSW.linkedContent: eating words, as excrement, as nourishing honey, as inky dust of law [Ezekiel, Numbers]

SP.content: la signature et le texte tombent l’un hors de l’autre, se sécrètent, se séparent, et s’excrètent, se forment de la coupure même qui les décapite, les échafaude en tronc sans tête, dès l’instant de leur itérabilité > expropriative commencement marks everything erected w/ structure of etron [fecal matter]
SP.linkedContent: la signature et le texte tombent l’un hors de l’autre, se sécrètent, se séparent, et s’excrètent, se forment de la coupure même qui les décapite, les échafaude en tronc sans tête, dès l’instant de leur itérabilité > expropriative commencement marks everything erected w/ structure of etron [fecal matter]

PS.content: for Artaud, history of God is the history of the work as excrement
PS.linkedContent: for Artaud, history of God is the history of the work as excrement

PS.content: Artaud: we shit the glue of minds, pure body doesn’t shit
PS.linkedContent: Artaud: we shit the glue of minds, pure body doesn’t shit

PS.content: like excrement, like turd, a metaphor of the penis, the work should stand up
PS.linkedContent: like excrement, like turd, a metaphor of the penis, the work should stand up

PS.content: man as the scato-theological being (this is the essence of guilt), capable of being soiled by the work and thieving God > God is a sin agains the unnameable Divine
PS.linkedContent: man as the scato-theological being (this is the essence of guilt), capable of being soiled by the work and thieving God > God is a sin agains the unnameable Divine

O.content: preface announces what will already have been written > Derrida claims preface presages a general practice of deconstruction, strange strategy w/out finality, cette défaillance organisatrice of telos or eschaton, which reinscribes restricted economy in general economy——[is this because the preface is an essential and ludicrous operation attempting to cancel out all displacement?]
O.linkedContent: preface announces what will already have been written > Derrida claims preface presages a general practice of deconstruction, strange strategy w/out finality, cette défaillance organisatrice of telos or eschaton, which reinscribes restricted economy in general economy——[is this because the preface is an essential and ludicrous operation attempting to cancel out all displacement?]

O.content: preface as excrement of philosophical essentiality? that which falls away (la tombée) > can we account for preface differently?
O.linkedContent: preface as excrement of philosophical essentiality? that which falls away (la tombée) > can we account for preface differently?

O.content: graft w/out body, bias w/out front, skew w/out line
Kierkegaard: digressions shouldn’t be treated as inessential in Appendix, as stagnant refuse
O.linkedContent: Kierkegaard: digressions shouldn’t be treated as inessential in Appendix, as stagnant refuse

C.content: arithmetic compulsion and la narration comptable in Sade’s 120 Days, part of the fun > its regular cadence, rhythmic operation: to excrete excrement, swallow it, en escompter la jouissance ——introjection of mors, morceau [Lacan’s objet a?] always lets drop a heterogenous remainder of incorporation > infinite analysis of mourning btwn introj./incorp.
C.linkedContent: arithmetic compulsion and la narration comptable in Sade’s 120 Days, part of the fun > its regular cadence, rhythmic operation: to excrete excrement, swallow it, en escompter la jouissance ——introjection of mors, morceau [Lacan’s objet a?] always lets drop a heterogenous remainder of incorporation > infinite analysis of mourning btwn introj./incorp.

C.content: one cannot get to it in one go (d’un coup): multiplication shows that that which touches on the series is outside the series in the series > the remainder remains cut off, a mors, a turd, really beautiful
C.linkedContent: one cannot get to it in one go (d’un coup): multiplication shows that that which touches on the series is outside the series in the series > the remainder remains cut off, a mors, a turd, really beautiful

C.content: a turd one would like to make one’s own (s’approprier)—until the end > until is interminable
C.linkedContent: a turd one would like to make one’s own (s’approprier)—until the end > until is interminable

C.content: disseminal spurt (projet) of semen [120 Days…] does not emerge (débouche) into the other’s mouth (bouche) before the turd has been incorporated by the mouth, his own: embouchure of the remainder, vomit in economimesis
C.linkedContent: disseminal spurt (projet) of semen [120 Days…] does not emerge (débouche) into the other’s mouth (bouche) before the turd has been incorporated by the mouth, his own: embouchure of the remainder, vomit in economimesis

C.content: copro-necrophagy: for those who found the analogy btwn 120 Days…and Titus-Carmel’s coffins forced > [Titus-Carmel has written: “place it there and eat it in a single mouthful”]

EU.content: for Schelling, those whose thought isn’t regulated by living and buzzing communion w/ divine [w/ community] are like sexless bees (geschlechtslose Bienen) > depositing inorganic excrement outside hive—proof of their platitudes
EU.linkedContent: for Schelling, those whose thought isn’t regulated by living and buzzing communion w/ divine [w/ community] are like sexless bees (geschlechtslose Bienen) > depositing inorganic excrement outside hive—proof of their platitudes
